title: U.S. government - Budget surplus or deficit 2000 to 2025
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 26.
Overall Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year '08 and '09.
Maximum Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars, about 1.41 was reported at Year '09
Minimum Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars about 0.13 was reached at Year '01

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 26.
In general Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year '08 and '09.
Maximum Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars, about 1.41 was reported at Year '09

The line significantly increased by 0.22 from Year '02 to '03,increased by 0.3 from Year '07 to '08, and lastly, increased by 0.95 from Year '08 to '09.
